content: the minas sweater is a playful celebration of color featuring an engaging 1x1 stranded colorwork design that captivates us with its rhythmic patterns and constant shifts we crafted it using our latest yarn ideal a 100% polwarth wool yarn that is bred spun and hand-dyed locally in uruguay the sweater s straightforward shape ensures that the vibrant and diverse palette of our new yarn takes center stage we re excited to see the unique versions you create finished measurements sizes 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 bust circumference 42 75 46 49 25 54 58 62 75 66 69 25 / 108 5 117 125 137 147 5 160 167 5 176 cm this garment has an oversized ﬁt and is intended to be worn with about 8 / 20 cm of positive ease yarn and quantities manos del uruguay ideal 100% polwarth wool approx 220 yds / 200 mts per 100 g quantities color a e21941 lipstick 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 skeins color b e2603 love potion 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 skeins color c e2451 ion 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 skeins color d e2477 glacial blue 1 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 skeins color e e2059 icarus 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 skeins sample shown in pictures was knitted in a size 2 alternative sample was made using colors peachblossom tahiti celadon zinnia and leo
